name: Untitled Space Game (USG)
description:
Gameplay Time: about 5-10 minutes.

This is Untitled Space Game (USG), a planet defence game where you protect the Earth from alien entities with missiles, and power-ups. This game has mechanics  that were merged from both Space Invaders and Asteroids into a single game project. 

(if there are any bugs, don't hesitate to let me know)

GAMEPLAY

- Protect the Earth from the alien enemies for as long as possible, as they try to destroy it.

- The planet/ship can both lose damage if they're hit by an enemy. If the planet or the ship loses all its health, it's game over and the aliens win!

- Use the power ups to keep ahead of the alien entities, you can heal your ship, get stronger bullets, speed up or wipe them off the screen entirely.

POWERUPS

SPEED UP 

HEALTH UP (+5) 

ONE HIT KILL 

NUKE (DESTROY ALL ON SCREEN) 

CONTROLS 

Keyboard / Mouse are the default control schemes

Gamepad is optional, controls will automatically switch if gamepad is detected (needs to be on before launching)

If you're using a keyboard and click on the screen, the keyboard navigation might not work (to fix this, restart a scene or restart the game)

KEYBOARD CONTROLS  A and DMove Left / RightSpaceShoot (Hold to Autofire)
Escape
Pause MenuArrow Keys
Naviagate Menus, Move Left / RightEnter / Mouse ClickSelect Menu Option GAMEPAD CONTROLS  Left / RightMove Left / Right A ButtonShoot (Hold to Autofire) Start ButtonPause Menu Left Analog Stick Naviagate Menus A Button Select Menu Option

---------------------------------------------

Credit to these incredible team members 

Aaron Pullia – Main Programmer / Code Cleaner

Lachlan Meens – Main Artist / Animator

Matthew Catalfamo – Sound Designer / Powerups

---------------------------------------------

With ‘USG’, I hoped to provide a unique approach to the ‘shoot em up’ genre while trying to make something that feels faithful to the arcade games of old.
